description.name: virtubep20
description.tagline: Virtucoin bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-virtu Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Virtucoin bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/virtu receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/virtu wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
